items.title: AZ blokkeert voorlopig huurdeal Kwakman: 'Niet de manier om hier weg te gaan'
items.summary: Dave Kwakman stond op het punt om door AZ aan FC Volendam verhuurd te worden, maar vooralsnog hebben de Alkmaarders de deal van de 21-jarige middenvelder geblokkeerd. 'Dave heeft zich slecht gepresenteerd bij de looptest gisteren', legt technisch directeur Max Huiberts van AZ uit. 'Misschien dat hij met zijn hoofd al ergens anders heeft gezeten. Maar hier werden we niet blij van. Zolang je onderdeel van AZ bent, moet je hier je best doen. We houden Dave hier. Dit is de niet de manier om weg te gaan bij AZ.' Huiberts sluit niet uit dat het later deze maand alsnog tot een verhuur komt van Kwakman, die in de eerst competitiehelft slechts 103 minuten speelde. In dat geval zal Kasper Boogaard zijn plek in de selectie innemen. Wie zaterdag ontbrak bij de eerste groepstraining van AZ van 2026 was Lequincio Zeefuik. De 21-jarige aanvaller sprak zaterdag met een van de clubs die in hem ge√Ønteresseerd is.

items.title: VI Live: Verbruggen, Van Hecke en Veltman tegen Hartman-loos Burnley
items.summary: In deze VI Live volgen we de hoogtepunten in verschillende competities. Met onder meer aandacht voor Celtic - Rangers FC, AFC Bournemouth - Arsenal en Espanyol - Barcelona.

items.title: 'Ontevreden Napoli wil af van Noa Lang, Galatasaray toont interesse'
items.summary: Noa Lang (26) heeft zijn stempel bij Napoli maar amper weten te drukken. Dat heeft mogelijk gevolgen voor de vleugelaanvaller van het Nederlands elftal, die deze zomer nog de veelbelovende overstap vanuit PSV maakte. Trainer Antonio Conte wil de linksbuiten slijten om ruimte te maken voor een vervanger: Kobbie Mainoo.

items.title: John McGinn double sinks Forest and provides perfect tonic for Aston Villa
items.summary: Aston Villa continue to surpass expectations as they bounced back from defeat by Arsenal to cement their place in the top three. Ollie Watkins celebrated his 250th appearance for the club with his fourth goal in three games and John McGinn added two more as Unai Emery‚Äôs side won their 11th straight home game. Villa‚Äôs ability to score out of next to nothing epitomises their season. They managed this game superbly, inflicting a fourth straight defeat on Nottingham Forest, but if the league table was made up of their expected goals difference, they would have started this weekend in 15th place. Continue reading...

items.title: Nancy plunged into deeper Celtic crisis after Chermiti leads Rangers in derby
items.summary: Wilfried Nancy spent a memorable Friday press conference pleading for time, context and understanding as he visibly struggles with the role of Celtic manager. This outcome ‚Äì and the nature of it ‚Äì will do nothing for Nancy‚Äôs hopes of keeping his job. Celtic‚Äôs beleaguered directors now face a critical and imminent decision over whether to keep faith with the Frenchman or write his appointment off as a bad mistake. This marked a sixth defeat in eight games for Nancy. It arrived against the backdrop of revolt from paying customers. Celtic feel an on- and off-field mess. Nancy is on the precipice. Continue reading...

items.title: Veerkrachtig Rangers deelt flinke tik uit aan aartsrivaal in Old Firm
Heerlijke goal Watkins zorgt voor vlekkeloze middag van runner-up Villa
items.summary: Aston Villa heeft zaterdagmiddag goede zaken gedaan in de Premier League. Op eigen veld werd overtuigend afgerekend met Nottingham Forest: 3-1. Daardoor hoeft de ploeg van manager Unai Emery enkel Arsenal nog voor zich te houden op de ranglijst.

items.title: Sources: Rosenior frontrunner to replace Maresca
items.summary: Strasbourg boss Liam Rosenior is the leading candidate to succeed Enzo Maresca as Chelsea head coach, sources have told ESPN.

items.title: Alonso unsure when Mbappe (knee) will return
items.summary: Xabi Alonso has admitted he "doesn't know" when Kylian Mbapp√© will return for Real Madrid, saying the club are working to have the star forward back from injury "as soon as possible."

items.title: Pep denies Maresca, City links: 'I have a contract'
items.summary: Pep Guardiola has reiterated his desire to stay on at Manchester City amid fresh rumours surrounding Enzo Maresca.

items.title: Neymar hint about next contract teased
items.summary: Santos have indicated that Neymar will be with the club until the end of the year.

items.title: Paul loses WBA cruiserweight ranking after defeat to Joshua
items.summary: Jake Paul has slipped out of the WBA cruiserweight rankings after losing his heavyweight clash with Anthony Joshua in Miami last month.

Swiatek: Women's tennis does not need 'Battle of the Sexes'
items.summary: Iga Swiatek says women's tennis does not need the 'Battle of the Sexes' and is able to "stand on its own".

items.title: Graduates reunited: Chelsea‚Äôs former Manchester City talents return
items.summary: Palmer and Delap are among five academy players who learnt their trade at City, as links between the clubs grow Chelsea‚Äôs visit to Manchester City on Sunday will be a homecoming for members of the travelling party. Five Chelsea players were nurtured at the academy that sits a few hundred yards from the Etihad Stadium, on the other side of a bridge. The London club‚Äôs recent recruitment has been heavily influenced by City‚Äôs teaching of players and coaches. Tosin Adarabioyo, Cole Palmer, Liam Delap, Jamie Gittens and Rom√©o Lavia were members of City‚Äôs youth ranks, most working there under Enzo Maresca. If one thread was unpicked this week when Maresca dramatically departed Chelsea, the link remains strong because Sunday‚Äôs caretaker, Calum McFarlane, was formerly the under-18s assistant manager at City. Continue reading...

items.title: Blackburn to Barcelona - Dolan's 'unbelievable' journey to Espanyol
items.summary: Five years ago, Tyrhys Dolan was playing for Clitheroe - now he is preparing to face Barcelona in the Catalan derby.

items.summary: What is Julien Laurens watching this weekend? There's the start of the post-Maresca era at Chelsea as they head to Man City, huge derbies in Scotland and France, and much more.

items.title: West Ham sign Brazilian forward Pablo Felipe
items.summary: West Ham complete the signing of Brazilian striker Pablo Felipe from Portuguese club Gil Vicente on a four-and-a-half-year deal.
